comment: Value of the linear span of a subset of Hilbert space. The span is the intersection of all subspaces constraining the subset. Definition of span in [Schechter] p. 276. (Contributed by NM, 2-Jun-2004.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 23-Dec-2013.) (New usage is discouraged.)
